original_title: Tough decisions on chicken meat price, eggs scarcity to be taken at next cabinet meeting: Amaraweera
original_body_lines: Agriculture Minister Mahinda Amaraweera today said that the government will take stern decisions related to the hike in the price of chicken meat and the scarcity of eggs.
He said the decisions will be taken during next week's cabinet discussion.
Necessary measures will be taken to stop the prices of chicken meat going up alarmingly through strict rules, the minister said. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
